about.title: About Us
about.slogan_primary: By Cambodians, for Cambodians — and the world.
slogans_alt: By Cambodians, for Cambodians — and the world.
Proudly Cambodian — from our roaster to the world.
about.story: We honor our grandfather’s heritage—sharing affordable, high-quality coffee with every Cambodian.
about.mission: Honor our heritage, promote local products, and provide high-quality coffee at an affordable price for all Cambodians.

heritage.title: Heritage
heritage.body: Our story begins with our grandfather roasting coffee over simple heat. His careful hands and patient timing taught us to respect the bean — to bring sweetness and clarity without shortcuts. Today, we keep his spirit alive with clean, small-batch roasts and transparent dates on every bag.
heritage.note: Grandfather: Take it slow — the bean will tell you when it’s ready.

core: Quality comparable to leading foreign brands

values.title: Freshness First
values.body: Roast-to-order with fast routes; most bags reach shelves in 3–4 days.

values.title: Farmer Friendly
values.body: Recent-crop sourcing and fair pay for partners across origins.

values.body: About two months of green beans on hand for peak flavor and turnover.

values.title: Transparent Dates
values.body: Roast dates on every bag — you always know when it was roasted.

values.title: Local & Proud
values.body: Roasted and packed in Cambodia — supporting local jobs.

values.title: Real Value
values.body: Premium taste at a fair price — no heavy marketing markup.

roast.title: Our Roast
roast.intro: We tune each batch for sweetness, clarity, and body using a clean, dry-roast approach.
highlights: Dry roast — preserves essential oils; no quench water.
Signature finish — a brief smoke-lock for deeper aromatics.
Consistent profiles across blends and single origins.

faq.a: We roast to order. Most bags reach shelves within 3–4 days of the roast date.
Yes. Cafés and grocers can contact us for weekly roasting slots and pricing.

faq.q: Which grind size should I choose?
faq.a: We can grind at checkout, but a burr grinder at home gives the best results.
